channel.title: Databases on MonkeyPatch
channel.description: Recent content in Databases on MonkeyPatch

item.title: J On The Beach 2018 — Review
item.description: J On The Beach (JOTB) is “A Big Data Conference On The Beach” happening in Malaga (Spain) and this year (2018) was its third edition.

item.title: J On The Beach 2017 — Jepsen Workshop
item.description:
The first book I’ve read about distributed systems was Distributed Systems: Principles and Paradigms by Andrew S. Tanenbaum and Maarten van Steen.
I was reading at the library on my last year of study and I remember being confused very often, and to be honest I didn’t even finish it…

item.title: J On The Beach 2017 — Review
item.description: J On The Beach (JOTB) is “A Big Data Conference On The Beach” happening in Malaga (Spain) and this year (2017) was its second edition.
